title: VoLTE on Pixel 3 XL in Georgia (country)
content:
I live in Georgia, Tbilisi. I have a Pixel 3 XL phone and I am not able to enable VoLTE. 
My mobile network provider supports VoLTE for various phones: https://www.magticom.ge/en/private/mobile/mobile-services/volte
There mentioned: "MagtiCom Network completely meets VoLTE standards. Therefore, the company is able to provide VoLTE service for all type of modern smartphones, but it is necessary for producers to activate this function specifically for Georgia."
So, Google, please enable VoLTE for our region
